q1: Why does Belgium grow such good players disproportionate to their size?
a1: Belgium have managed to produce good players as youth football is taken very seriously in the country
q2: Belgium will be champs one day
a2: Have no doubt in that next Euro's.
a3: I'm sure they can if they keep improving their form.
q4: Does Belgium have free-flowing attacking football?
a5: I Like It (Cardi B, Bad Bunny and J Balvin song)
